segments.text: Do you know what time it is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Get in this door young man . It ’ s midnight , you are two hours past curfew .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but it wasn ’ t my fault ! I told Jennifer she had to drop me off before ten , but she wouldn ’ t leave the party !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t care ! You are grounded for life , mister !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know the rules and you broke them . No allowance and no TV for a week . I usually never ground you but this time I have to put my foot down !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ! For being a couple of hours late ? You have to be kidding !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t want to hear it ! Now go to your room !
segments.speaker: S1
